name: Bestcoin
description: Bestcoin ($BEST) is a coin created with the objective of winning the Let's Bonk Hackathon and establish itself as... well, the best coin. In an industry where the majority of tech projects are low efforts or straight-up scams, we want to make clear that "the meme is the best technology" and that way more real people can really behind a good meme than they will ever rally behind anything else. Simply the best coin.
